meta.name: 澳洲維港 Victoria HongKongers
meta.about: We are a group of Hong Kongers living in Victoria, who are gravely concerned with the situation at home in Hong Kong since June 2019. We volunteer to support Hong Kong’s democracy movement and ​Hongkongers who newly arrived to settle in Victoria.

meta.name: 澳洲維港 Victoria Hongkongers Association (AU) Inc.
meta.about: We're a group of Hongkongers who volunteer to grow the dispora and help the newly arrived hkers to settle in Victoria (Australia).
